description:
Skater Bunny Simulator is a vibrant and thrilling skateboarding simulator where you control not just any character, but a stylish and daring bunny. With intuitive dual stick controls, you'll feel like a real skateboarder. Practice managing the bunny's movements and weight to master the nuances of virtual skateboarding, while realistic and smooth physics make the riding process engaging and believable.
In the game, you'll encounter unforgettable missions that require performing complex tricks and combinations. Beautiful and varied locations immerse you in the world of street extreme sports, and a progressive tutorial system helps you quickly grasp the basics of control so you can enjoy every trick you land.
Show off your individuality with deep customization options. In the game, you can customize your skateboard's appearance, including wheels, deck, and trucks, and choose stylish outfits for your bunny character. Earn money, complete quests, and spend it in shops to upgrade your gear and add even more uniqueness to your character.
Skater Bunny Simulator offers you not just a game, but a whole world of exciting skateboarding adventures, where every trick and every location becomes a personal achievement.
name: Skater Bunny Simulator
intro: Unleash your skate skills and hop to new heights with Skater Bunny Simulator!
